welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haaren, Germany! Known for its quaint charm and stunning natural beauty, this city has so much to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Haaren has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, primarily used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
